Offer.OfferDescription: This simple, original recipe for strawberry preserves has just two ingredients: strawberries and sugar!
This simple, original recipe for blackberry preserves has just two ingredients: blackberries and sugar!
This simple, original recipe for peach preserves has just two ingredients: peaches and sugar!
16 ounces of 100% all-natural clover & wildflower honey.
Those of us from the South will never forget the special flavor of pure sorghum on hot biscuits!

Offer.OfferName: Country Ham Center Cut Slices - Set of 4

Offer.OfferDescription:
A full-sized country ham, uncooked and aged 6 to 9 months. This ham can be baked or boiled to your liking. 14-16 lbs. average.<br><br><br>
**All meat items and meat gift sets ship Monday through Wednesday via 2-DAY UPS. <b>Bacon and Spiral Ham should be refrigerated immediately. Country Ham Slices and Pieces are USDA-approved shelf-stable products, good out of refrigeration for up to 7 days.</b> Orders will ship the business day after they are placed (M-W). We do not ship our meat items or meat gift sets internationally. The shipping charge for all meat items and meat gift sets is $15.00 per meat set.**

Offer.OfferName: Spiral Sliced Glazed Country Ham - Fully Cooked

Offer.OfferDescription: Stone-ground white corn grits. Top with cheese and butter for a tasty Southern dish!

Our old-fashioned peanut brittle brings back happy memories with every bite. Eat it right out of the box as a snack, chop it up and sprinkle pieces on top of ice cream or mix it into your next batch of brownies for something really delicious!

Custom blended and roasted just for us, this signature coffee is rich and strong without the burnt bitter taste you get from those fancy overpriced coffee shops. Each 1.5 oz. bag makes one standard pot of coffee. Also available in larger 8 oz. bags.
One of each of our preserves in 2 oz sample jars -- this is a great gift idea for any occasion! Stock up for hostess gifts and party favors!

Our hot pepper relish adds instant flavor to all your favorite dishes! Not to mention, it's pretty darn tasty on hot dogs too. Try pouring over cream cheese and serving with crackers for a quick party snack.

Written by acclaimed Gourmet Magazine contributors and noted food critics Jane and Michael Stern, "Southern Country Cooking from the Loveless Cafe" is a must-have for any kitchen, with dozens and dozens of recipes right out of our kitchen.
This sweet and sour pickled vegetable relish has everything from green beans to green tomatoes. Great as an addition to relish trays or mixed in with garden salads to add some extra zing!
The bits of sweet pickled peppers in this relish will surely add a new country twist to any recipe. It's pretty darn tasty on a cheeseburger too!
A Tennessee treat, this sweet and sour relish is delicious as a condiment with beans, chili and soups - plus it'll make any prepared salad more delicious when you substitute it for regular relish.

Here in the South we like to eat chow chow as a condiment with cooked beans. This hot version is wonderful when added to a bowl of homemade chili or used in place of relish in your favorite chicken or tuna salad recipe!
Our all-natural corn relish is just delicious when used as a condiment for black-eyed peas, pinto beans and even chili.
People tell us all the time they haven't had beets like these since their granny made 'em!
These yummy pickles are packed with fresh garlic cloves and sliced jalapeno peppers. We use them here at the Cafe chopped up in our potato salad - try some for yourself!
This delicious Pumpkin Butter tastes like a homemade pumpkin pie! Spread it on biscuits, toast or crackers, or try mixing it in with your favorite bread or cake batter for a special treat.

Everybody loves the sweet and spicy flavor of apple butter. Our old-fashioned apple butter is still made with the same time-honored methods and goes piping-hot straight from the kettle into this jar. Try your apple butter on biscuits, toast, crackers or even just a spoon!

Offer.OfferName: Sweet With A Bite BBQ Sauce
Offer.OfferDescription: Dress up your next meal with the same exact sauce we use at the Loveless, boasting the perfect balance of "sweet" and "heat!"
Our seasoning salt is incredible on crispy fried chicken, but you can use it on anything you wish; try it on grilled vegetables, fish or burgers!

This is the magic mixture that is the secret to our amazing pulled pork: our delicious Dry Rub BBQ Seasoning balances a little bit of sweet (brown sugar) with a little bit of heat (chili and chipotle powder).

Offer.OfferName: Country Ham Biscuit Pieces - Set of 6

Offer.OfferDescription: Glass half empty or half full? Our logo pint glass helps settle the question with liquid measurement marks along the side.
Made from an old family recipe, these Fig Preserves are the real thing! Sweet and rich, they'll bring back the memories of Granny's slow-cooked southern recipe.

Got Biscuits? Our 2 lb. bag of Loveless Biscuit Mix isn't the exact same thing you'll be served in the Cafe, but it sure is pretty darn close! Just mix with buttermilk to make over 50 delicious Loveless-style Southern biscuits!
The Loveless Cafe is famous for our scratch-made biscuits and fresh preserves. Enjoy your own at home!
Don't settle for anything less than 100% pure maple syrup!
When you're looking for good old-fashioned heat and flavor, this hot sauce will do it! Made with Louisiana hot peppers.

When you want more than just heat with flavor too, this is the hot sauce for you! Try it on all types of meat or add a dash or two to your favorite recipe instead of pepper. Made from scratch with diced onions, garlic and spices.
This heavy-duty diner-style mug means business, printed with the "L" design from the original Loveless Cafe screen door.
It took us a long time to find that perfect balance for our coffee; you'll appreciate the richness and strength without the burnt bitter taste you get from those fancy overpriced coffee shops.
These whimsical flyswatters do their job darn well, with a silly sense of humor to boot. Choose either red or blue.
This simple, original recipe has just two ingredients: blackberries and sugar!
This simple, original recipe has just two ingredients: peaches and sugar!
This simple, original recipe for strawberry preserves has just two ingredients: strawberries and sugar!
Choose from two of our favorite Sweet Sentiment sayings on these kitchen spatulas, complete with a Loveless Cafe inscription on the wooden handle.
With this magnet set, you get one of each of our Sweet Sentiment sayings to give as gifts or hang on your refrigerator to cheer up your kitchen!
Calling all bacon fans! Show off your love for all things bacon with this tee that actually smells like bacon!
Our classic "Got Biscuits?" Tee is back! Available in Red and Blue.
Get in the Nashville Spirit with our comfy-cozy gameday shirts in aqua and orange. These shirts do run large for extra comfort.
We've enhanced our set of sentimental favorites with fresh colors on a soft, durable, cotton kitchen towel. Choose from four charming designs.
Even your little train conductor can be a fan of the Loveless Cafe with this old-fashioned wooden train whistle.
The only thing that could make caramel popcorn better is adding real bits of our own Applewood Smoked Country Bacon!
Try all three of our Moonshine Mixers: zesty Mason Jar Mary, refreshing Blue Lightnin', and sweet Countrypolitan. Just add 'shine!
The star of Sunday morning, our Biscuit & Waffle Bar gift set has everything you need to feed the whole family.
Crunchy, sweet and salty, our cashew brittle is hand made in small batches using a luscious Southern recipe that's just full of butter, sugar and nuts.
Perfect to put 'em on more than just our world-famous biscuits! This case of six jars will keep your cupboards stocked or make for great gifts.

We make our all-natural Blackberry Preserves with whole juicy Marion blackberries and pure cane sugar. Put 'em on more than just our world-famous biscuits! We will pack up this case of six for you to keep or share.

We make our all-natural Strawberry Preserves with whole juicy strawberries and pure cane sugar. We love to put 'em on more than just our world-famous biscuits! Here's a case of six jars so you have enough to keep or share!
Receive a box of six 2 lb bags of our famous Biscuit Mix. Also available in individual 2 lb bags.

Ever wonder what makes our Peach-Glazed Pork Chops at the Cafe so good? The secret is our Peach-B-Q rub! This seasoning has just the right amount of fresh peach flavor, coupled with salt, brown sugar and all-natural herbs and spices. Use it on anything from ribs to chicken to bring out a little summertime flavor in your favorite dishes!
Made with real sweet potatoes, this mix is bound to be your new favorite; simply blend our mix with water for tasty, fluffy, slightly sweet pancakes and waffles!

Ever since 1951, we've been cooking up our famous Fried Chicken with Annie Loveless' original recipe. Crispy, tasty and delicious, we're now offering our exact recipe mix for you to cook at home! With 2.5 pounds of breading, you'll have enough to cook up a whole mess of Loveless Cafe fried chicken.
A modern classic, this best-selling tee features our iconic roadside neon sign, printed on super-soft jersey knit in heather navy.

Offer.OfferName: Junior Super Soft Sign Tee - Pink
Offer.OfferDescription: Our signature tee is pretty in pink! It's a super-soft ladies style, printed using soft-touch inks. <strong>This is a junior's size shirt, so it does run small.</strong>
This men's shirt is actually very popular here at the Loveless with everybody on our staff - men and ladies! That probably has something to do with the soft 'throwback' baseball design.
Put your "little biscuit" in one of these delightfully soft "Made from Scratch" onesies from the Loveless Cafe! Available in three adorable colors.
Made with thick glass and authentic, resealable white plastic snap lids, not only are they great for decoration, but perfect for all sorts of beverages.

Imagine the classic flavor of sweet, salty, and crunchy peanut brittle, then pack it with bits of real Loveless Cafe Country Smoked Bacon. What you've got is our signature Piggy Brittle! Eat it as a snack, sprinkle pieces on top of ice cream, or chop it up and mix it into a batch of cookies or brownies!

Crunchy, sweet, and salty, our all-natural pecan brittle is made with premium pecans and an old-fashioned recipe that brings back happy memories with every bite. More than just a snack, it's a great kitchen ingredient too - try chopping it up and mixing into your next batch of cookies!
Because everything is better with bacon, our "Piggy" snacks are made with real country bacon and are sure to satisfy your sweet tooth!
This cast-iron cutie is branded with our script logo. We made it rectangular to fit under standard casserole dishes when not proudly displayed on the stove.
Our big red ceramic mug holds 22 ounces of your morning brew. It's got a hefty handle and our Cafe logo in bright white.
This simple, original recipe has just two ingredients: strawberries and sugar!
Check out the old-style details on our playful "Our Butts are Smokin'" apron: It's a sturdy, black cotton denim with two big front pockets to hold tools or seasonings while you're on the grill!
This simple, original recipe has just two ingredients: peaches and sugar!
This simple, original recipe has just two ingredients: blackberries and sugar!
Perfect for hostess gifts or party favors, our 2 oz. jars are filled with the same all-natural real fruit preserves we're so famous for!
Perfect for hostess gifts or party favors, our 2 oz. jars are filled with the same all-natural real fruit preserves we're so famous for!
Perfect for hostess gifts or party favors, our 2 oz. jars are filled with the same all-natural real fruit preserves we're so famous for!
This spicy version of our Seasoning Salt may be called "Chicken Shake" but we love it on everything from vegetables to sweet potato fries! Sure to add some spice to anything you sprinkle it on!
Part of the Loveless Dairy collection, this jumbo coffee mug holds a whopping 22 ounces of hot coffee!
Authentic Loveless Cafe faded "L" logo cap in navy. Six panel style with print and embroidered logo and adjustable back closure. Soft worn and faded cotton twill is 100% cotton.
Simple yet perfectly suited for all styles. This Loveless "LC" baseball cap comes in four color combinations.
We love this tee for its relaxed fit, stylish faded appearance and soft feel. We're "Takin' Care of Biscuits" and proud of it!
This retro, super-soft, lightweight sweatshirt will quickly find its way into wardrobe. Don't be surprised if this staff favorite becomes yours too!

Offer.OfferName: Sweet Sentiment Tea Towels - Set of 4
Offer.OfferDescription: We've enhanced our set of sentimental favorites with fresh colors on a soft, durable, cotton kitchen towel.
This duo of kitchen towels pairs a cheerful red/ivory checked towel with one in solid ivory, printed with our signature script logo.
Our friends at Caja Popcorn created this exclusive popcorn trio just for us, featuring pimento cheese popcorn, red velvet popcorn, and our piggy popcorn made with real bits of bacon.
For our aspiring country singers out there - ready to crown the next Music City Princess!
Stars, stripes and a blue guitar are featured on this youth tee that proclaims "Future Country Star".
Hand-made in small batches, our three brittle flavors are the perfect balance of sweet n' salty goodness.
Get ready to grill with all of our sauces, shakes and seasonings! We've got plenty of great recipes using these too.
Our cuddly plush bear is proud to wear a Loveless Cafe t-shirt. Soft and lovable, he is 9 inches tall and comes in assorted colors.
A great gift for your favorite grillmaster, the "Our Butts Are Smokin'" Tee is a very popular choice!
Proud to be "100% Country", this bold design features a mason jar branded with Nashville, Tenn, screen-printed in blue on a heather gray tee.
Our iconic cafe/motel sign is featured on a simple short sleeve cotton tee, in black.
We've taken our Cafe/Motel logo and printed it on a bright sky-blue short sleeved tee for a modern classic look.
Here's a tee that makes a bold statement for both "Southern Rock" and "Proud to Be Country" right here in Nashville.
Classic black cotton tee is printed with a vintage pickup truck, just like the ones we see cruisin' up Tennessee Highway 100.
Dress up your youngin' with this bring, bling Neon Logo tee.
This jar opener will come in handy quite often, and you'll be reminded of the Loveless Cafe with every use!

Offer.OfferName: Belgian Waffle and Pancake Mix Case of 6
Offer.OfferDescription: Our exclusive Belgian waffle and pancake mix is the home-sized version of what we use right here in the Cafe! Old-fashioned unbleached cotton bag has a tie closure

Offer.OfferName: Sweet Potato Pancake Mix Case of 6
Offer.OfferDescription: There's a whole lot of flavor in this one little bag! Made with real sweet potatoes and just the right touch of spice, our Sweet Potato Pancakes have quickly become one of our most popular weekend specials. . . and after you taste these delicious pancake treats, you'll know why! Easy to make and even easier to eat, simply blend our mix with water for tasty, fluffy, slightly sweet pancakes. Also makes delicious Sweet Potato Waffles.
It's the spicy-zesty recipe that we serve in the Cafe: bold enough to mix with moonshine, but super-smooth with vodka or gin.
This classic diner mug in white ceramic features our neon sign on one side and a retro road trip car on the other. Sturdy wide-bottomed shape and two-finger handle.

To create the perfect blend of tart and sweet, we've added fresh-pressed tangerine juice for our Loveless take on the classic Cosmo. Just add a little 'shine (or your favorite vodka), and start a new Southern sippin' tradition.
We've combined our famous Blackberry Preserves and our "Sweet With a Bite" BBQ Sauce to create our NEW Blackberry BBQ Sauce! ...And you thought our Blackberry Preserves were only good for biscuits...
This charming ornament would make a great addition to your Christmas tree, or even year-round in your kitchen!
Show off your Love for the Loveless Cafe with a TLC bumper sticker!
It doesn't get more "charming" than this charm keychain!
Cozy up with our unique pear-shaped blue & cream mug, perfect for sippin' coffee or tea at home!
Our blue & cream shot glass is a fantastic collectible or small gift.
Spread the Love with these assorted postcards from the Loveless Cafe!
Keep your drink cold with these collectible Loveless Cafe koozies, available in red and blue.
Paying homage to the original Loveless Motel, these key fobs come in numbers 1-15.

Made with thick glass and authentic, resealable white plastic snap lids, not only are these milk bottles great for decoration, but perfect for all sorts of beverages. Collect all 3 to add a little old-fashioned charm to your kitchen!
This darling apron is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves! The oilcloth material is sturdy and really great for any home cook or baker.
Dress up your little helper in this adorable children's apron, which is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves!
This charming lunch tote is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves! Bringing your lunch to work has never been so cute!
Sturdy, stylin', and simply adorable, this large tote bag is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves!
Add a little charm to your kitchen with this perfect pot holder, which is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves!
No more searching for two pot holders while cookin' up your favorite dishes! This handy double pot holder is part of our "Fruit Toss" collection, inspired by flavors of our famous fruit preserves.

Offer.OfferName: Our Butts are Smokin' Burlap Can Cooler
Offer.OfferDescription: Show off your BBQ love with this nifty "Our Butts Are Smokin'" can cooler!
This lightweight ladies fit hoodie is perfect for the fall weather or lounging around the house.
Our "Make Biscuits Not War Tee" is back! This unisex fit shirt is great for both men and women to show your love for biscuits!
We can't necessarily help you bake, but we can surely make baking easier with this sturdy, branded, old-fashioned rolling pin: your very own Biscuit Stick!
Fill our Mini Market Tote with spices in the pantry, toys for the kids, or jams to give as a gift!
Enjoy 4 unique flavors of hand-picked pecans made by Oliver Pecan Company. Share with the office or keep 'em for yourself!
This keepsake keychain shows off an old-fashioned sketch of the Loveless Cafe and its famous Neon Sign too!
Sip your drink in style with our Mint Tumbler, featuring the famous Loveless Cafe Neon Sign logo.

Offer.OfferName: Our Butts are Smokin Cutting Board
Offer.OfferDescription: This quality cutting board, shaped like a pig and inscribed with "Our Butts Are Smokin' at the Loveless Cafe | Nashville, TN", makes a fantastic housewarming or hostess gift.
Part of the "Our Butts are Smokin' at the Loveless Cafe" collection, this new towel makes a great gift for your favorite grill-master (or yourself), and it has a nice corner grommet for easy hanging.

As part of the "Our Butt's Are Smokin'" collection, this change tray brings the feel of summertime grillin' inside to your kitchen, entryway, coffee table, or wherever you want to throw your change, keys and other trinkets.
This is the perfect apron for grilling in your backyard, printed with our special "Tasty Portions of a Pig" artwork. It'll make a great gift for new homeowners or neighbors!
Throw on our adorable "L" Logo Apron to look cute while cookin' in the kitchen or out on the grill! It even has nice big pockets for extra functionality.
Take a piece of the Loveless Cafe home with our striped kitchen towel; the "L" is the same "L" found in the rod-iron design of Lon and Annie Loveless's original front door back in 1951!

Start your morning off with a sweet sentiment! These charming mugs come in mint: "Sweeter Than Pie", and red: "We Go Together Like Ham & Biscuits" so give 'em as gifts to your favorite coffee buddies or go ahead and get one for yourself!

Decorate your Christmas tree with our classic Loveless Cafe Neon Sign! This tin ornament is light-weight and just the right size to show your love for the Loveless Cafe - or give it as a gift to your loved ones!
Choose from two sweet southern sayings: "Sweeter Than Pie" in Mint, and "I Love You Like Biscuits And Gravy" in Blue. These greeting cards will put a smile on anyone's face!
Our Measuring Shot Glass and Measuring Pint Glass will be the most useful set of glassware in your kitchen!
Show off your love for the Loveless Cafe with our classic Neon Sign as a car magnet!
With it's rugged interior look and matte black finish, this Black Mug with our pig design and logo would be a unique addition to your mug collection, or a great gift for Father's Day or Christmas!
We're taking it back to the days of neon with this charming shot glass is in the shape of a heart!
Show your Love for the Loveless Cafe all the time with this awesome bottle opener keychain in the shape of a dog tag!
With a sturdy weight and a strong magnet, this bottle opener is a great keepsake to have around the house.

Now you can sip your cup o' joe from our favorite over-sized mug, bright red on the inside and adorned with the classic Loveless Cafe & Motel Neon Sign you see on Highway 100 in Nashville, Tennessee! Hint, hint: this makes a GREAT gift for the friend you visited the Cafe with, the aunt who loves Nashville, or the co-worker you know loves coffee every morning.
Our newest Moonshine Mixer is a one-of-a-kind, refreshing blueberry mix with a hint of orange that you'll love to sip on a hot summer day! Just add 'shine (or vodka or gin).

We've taken our classic "Sweet With A Bite" BBQ Sauce and our famous Peach Preserves, and combined the two tastes for a brand new BBQ sauce that's seriously good on chicken, pork, or even grilled vegetables!
Four adorable mugs conveniently stack together to create a guitar image - the perfect keepsake from both the Loveless Cafe and Music City!
Our latest long-sleeve tee is super comfortable, great for both men and women, and it'll show off your love for the Loveless Cafe, and Nashville too!
We've got your next favorite hoodie right here in two-toned gray with a retro "Est. 1951" design.
